name: Odyssey (Hades and Hermes)
description:
Content Warning: Mild Nudity.

Odyssey is a Visual Novel, Role Playing, and Adventure game on the journey to find your lost head and to unravel mysteries of the universe inside the game. Stories and contexts are derived from Greek and Chinese mythologies, Buddhism, and the movie Fantastic Planet.

It's still in development. The first Chapter: Enlightenment is finished. 

Music Credit:

S.E.N.S. - The Southern Cross (Remix)

Shanghai Philharmonic Orchestra - Pea-Blossoms Are In Bloom (Reverb)

Music will be replaced with the licensed piece in the future.
